## Project Requirements (Completed)
Creating a comprehensive telehealth portal similar to Sesame Care with the following features:
- Doctor booking and scheduling
- Video consultations
- Prescription refills
- Patient dashboard
- Provider profiles
- Payment processing
- Responsive design for web and mobile
- React for web, React Native for mobile/iOS
